&reftitle.install;
To enable MonetDB access in PHP you need to follow few steps.
You need to have MonetDB installed. You can find MonetDB source and binary distributions at &url.monetdb;. After successfull installation MONET_PREFIX variable, useful in further steps, should be defined. Additionally, you should declare MONET_SRC variable, pointing to location where you installed MonetDB source.
You need to obtain PHP source distribution. For details please read section Installation. In next steps we assume PHP source is installed in directory pointed by PHP_SRC variable.
Since MonetDB PHP module is not a part of official PHP distribution, you need to add MonetDB to PHP source tree, e.g. by running:
cd $PHP_SRC ln -s $MONET_SRC/src/mapi/clients/php/Cimpl ext/monetdb ./buildconf --force
Now you can configure PHP to include MonetDB API module. You have two choices here:
MonetDB API statically linked into PHP binary. To do it, you just configure PHP in a following way:
./configure --with-monetdb
MonetDB API compiled as dynamically loaded module. To do it, you need to configure PHP in a following way:
./configure --with-monetdb=shared
Since it is possible that MonetDB include files and libraries are not in the default path, you should sometimes specify MonetDB path explicitly. To do it you either need to have MONET_PREFIX environment variable specified, or call configure with proper information, e.g.:
# for statically linked MonetDB module ./configure --with-monetdb=path/to/your/monet/installation # for dynamically loaded MonetDB module ./configure --with-monetdb=shared,path/to/your/monet/installation
Please bear in mind, that on most Linux machines PHP is already installed. To avoid conflicts with other version, you may force PHP to use different installation and configuration directories, e.g. by running:
./configure --with-monetdb=shared --prefix=$PHP_INSTALL --with-config-file-path=$PHP_INSTALL/etc
If configuration succeeds you can compile and install PHP by running:
make clean make make install
After successfull compilation and installation you can check if MonetDB PHP module is running by executing e.g.:
$PHP_INSTALL/bin/php < $MONET_SRC/src/mapi/clients/php/Cimpl/monetdb.php > test.html mozilla test.html
